descriptor: they all watch the series of J
R arrives late
theme song
transition
C asks Pb to play with him at the foosball table, but she has another idea...
Eddie comes out of his room because Pb called him
Pb leaves home pretending she has other things to do - she wants to leave them alone!
they talk about their past relationships...
transition
Pb ends her performance at the cafe
the guys are getting ready to leave + M asks Dr B to treat her at her place tonight
transition
Eddie's ex comes to bring him his aquarium
Eddie comes up behind her
She leaves + Eddie has doubts about C's intentions
J asks Pb to read him the comments about him in a gossip magazine
the screenwriter writes (script) for the series...
a messenger brings the script to J
J is disappointed w the script
the guys come back from coffee
M asks Dr B how many partners he has had
R does the same w Ra
Eddie is beside himself - he's disconnected...
